CMP-LZ-P-NETWORK-KEY.name: cmp-lz-p-network
CMP-LZ-P-NETWORK-KEY.description: Prod Workload Environment, Common Network Compartment

CMP-LZ-P-SECURITY-KEY.name: cmp-lz-p-security
CMP-LZ-P-SECURITY-KEY.description: Prod Workload Environment, Common Security Compartment

CMP-LZ-P-PLATFORM-KEY.name: cmp-lz-p-platform
CMP-LZ-P-PLATFORM-KEY.description: Prod Workload Environment, Common Platform Compartment

CMP-LZ-P-PROJECTS-KEY.name: cmp-lz-p-projects
CMP-LZ-P-PROJECTS-KEY.description: One-OE Prod Workload Environment, Common Projects Compartment

GRP-IAM-ADMINS.name: grp-iam-admins
GRP-IAM-ADMINS.description: Tenancy global Identity and access management administrator group.

GRP-AUDITORS.name: grp-auditors
GRP-AUDITORS.description: Tenancy global read access group(for security auditing or health checks).

GRP-SECURITY-ADMINS.name: grp-security-admins
GRP-SECURITY-ADMINS.description: Tenancy Security Administrators for global resources as Cloud Guard.

GRP-LZ-NETWORK-ADMINS.name: grp-lz-network-admins
GRP-LZ-NETWORK-ADMINS.description: Production Landing Zone Environment shared network administration group, including common OE network elements.

GRP-LZ-SECURITY-ADMINS.name: grp-lz-security-admins
GRP-LZ-SECURITY-ADMINS.description: Production Landing Zone Environment shared security administration group, including common OE network elements.

GRP-LZ-PLATFORM-ADMINS.name: grp-lz-platform-admins
GRP-LZ-PLATFORM-ADMINS.description: Production Landing Zone Environment shared platform administration group, including common OE network elements.

GRP-LZ-P-ADMINS.name: grp-lz-p-proj1-admins
GRP-LZ-P-ADMINS.description: Production Landing Zone Environment, Production environment, Project 1, Administrators.

PCY-SERVICES.name: pcy-services
PCY-SERVICES.description: Policy for all supported services in the tenancy.
statements: allow service cloudguard to manage cloudevents-rules in tenancy where target.rule.type='managed'
allow service cloudguard to read tenancies in tenancy
allow service cloudguard to read all-resources in tenancy
allow service cloudguard to use network-security-groups in tenancy
allow any-user to { WLP_BOM_READ, WLP_CONFIG_READ } in tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent'}

endorse any-user to { WLP_LOG_CREATE, WLP_METRICS_CREATE, WLP_ADHOC_QUERY_READ, WLP_ADHOC_RESULTS_CREATE } in any-tenancy where all { request.principal.id = target.agent.id, request.principal.type = 'workloadprotectionagent' }
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to manage instances in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read compartments in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read repos in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read vnics in tenancy
allow service vulnerability-scanning-service to read vnic-attachments in tenancy
allow service osms to read instances in tenancy
allow service blockstorage, oke, streaming, Fssoc1Prod, objectstorage-eu-frankfurt-1 to use keys in tenancy

PCY-GENERIC-PERMISSIONS.name: pcy-generic-permissions
PCY-GENERIC-PERMISSIONS.description: Policy to allow different groups to use generic services.
statements: allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to use cloud-shell in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to use cloud-shell-public-network in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read usage-budgets in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read usage-reports in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins', 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read objectstorage-namespaces in tenancy

PCY-IAM-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy-iam-administration
PCY-IAM-ADMINISTRATION.description: Policy to allow grp-iam-admins group users to manage IAM resources in the tenancy.
statements: allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage policies in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage users in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to inspect groups in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage groups in tenancy where all {target.group.name != 'Administrators'}
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage identity-providers in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage dynamic-groups in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage authentication-policies in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage network-sources in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage quota in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage tag-defaults in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage tag-namespaces in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage orm-jobs in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-iam-admins' to manage orm-config-source-providers in tenancy

PCY-COST-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy-cost-administration
PCY-COST-ADMINISTRATION.description: Policy which allows grp-cost-admins group users to manage all budget resources in the tenancy.
statements: define tenancy usage-report as ocid1.tenancy.oc1..aaaaaaaaned4fkpkisbwjlr56u7cj63lf3wffbilvqknstgtvzub7vhqkggq
endorse group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-cost-admins' to read objects in tenancy usage-report
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-cost-admins' to manage usage-report in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-cost-admins' to manage usage-budgets in tenancy

PCY-AUDITING.name: pcy-auditing
PCY-AUDITING.description: Policy which allows grp-auditors group users to read all the resources in the tenancy.
statements: allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to inspect all-resources in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read instances in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read load-balancers in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read buckets in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read nat-gateways in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read public-ips in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read file-family in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read instance-configurations in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read network-security-groups in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read resource-availability in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read audit-events in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read users in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to use cloud-shell in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read vss-family in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read usage-budgets in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read usage-reports in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read data-safe-family in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read vaults in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read keys in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read tag-namespaces in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to read serviceconnectors in tenancy

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-auditors' to use ons-family in tenancy where any {request.operation!=/Create*/, request.operation!=/Update*/, request.operation!=/Delete*/, request.operation!=/Change*/}

PCY-SECURITY-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy-security-administration
PCY-SECURITY-ADMINISTRATION.description: Policy which allows grp-security-admins group users to manage all security resources in the security compartment.
statements: allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins' to manage cloudevents-rules in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins' to manage cloud-guard-family in tenancy
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-security-admins' to read tenancies in tenancy

PCY-LZ-NETWORK-ADMINISTRATION.name: pcy-lz-network-administration
PCY-LZ-NETWORK-ADMINISTRATION.description: Policy which allows grp-lz-network-admins group users to manage all network resources in the child compartments of cmp-landingzone with the matching tags.
statements: allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read all-resources in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage virtual-network-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage dns in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage load-balancers in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage alarms in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage metrics in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage orm-stacks in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage orm-jobs in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage orm-config-source-providers in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read audit-events in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read work-requests in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage instance-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage volume-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where all{sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin')), request.permission != 'VOLUME_BACKUP_DELETE', request.permission != 'VOLUME_DELETE', request.permission != 'BOOT_VOLUME_BACKUP_DELETE'}

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage object-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where all{sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin')), request.permission != 'OBJECT_DELETE', request.permission != 'BUCKET_DELETE'}

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage file-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where all{sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin')), request.permission != 'FILE_SYSTEM_DELETE', request.permission != 'MOUNT_TARGET_DELETE', request.permission != 'EXPORT_SET_DELETE', request.permission != 'FILE_SYSTEM_DELETE_SNAPSHOT', request.permission != 'FILE_SYSTEM_NFSv3_UNEXPORT'}

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage bastion-session in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage cloudevents-rules in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read instance-agent-plugins in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage keys in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to use key-delegate in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage secret-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to manage repos in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read vss-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read ons-topics in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-security-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to use bastion in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-security-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to use bastion-session in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-security-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to use vaults in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-security-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-network-admins' to read logging-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-security-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-security-admins' to manage private-ips in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-security-admins' to read keys in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-network-admin'))

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-security-admins' to manage operator-control-family in compartment cmp-landingzone where sets-intersect(target.resource.compartment.tag.tn-lz-role.name, ('lzp-security-admin'))

PCY-LZ-P-PROJ1.name: pcy-lz-p-proj1-admins
PCY-LZ-P-PROJ1.description: Policy which allows grp-lz-p-proj1-admins group to use shared resources and manage their dedicated project 1 compartment
statements: allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read all-resources in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read bucket in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to inspect object in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use network-security-groups in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage api-gateway-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage streams in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage cluster-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage alarms in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage metrics in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage logging-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage instance-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage volume-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1 where all{request.permission != 'VOLUME_BACKUP_DELETE', request.permission != 'VOLUME_DELETE', request.permission != 'BOOT_VOLUME_BACKUP_DELETE'}

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage object-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1 where all{request.permission != 'OBJECT_DELETE', request.permission != 'BUCKET_DELETE'}

allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage file-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1 where all{request.permission != 'FILE_SYSTEM_DELETE', request.permission != 'MOUNT_TARGET_DELETE', request.permission != 'EXPORT_SET_DELETE', request.permission != 'FILE_SYSTEM_DELETE_SNAPSHOT', request.permission != 'FILE_SYSTEM_NFSv3_UNEXPORT'}
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage repos in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage orm-stacks in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage orm-jobs in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage orm-config-source-providers in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read audit-events in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read work-requests in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage bastion-session in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage cloudevents-rules in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read instance-agent-plugins in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage keys in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use key-delegate in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage secret-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use subnets in compartment cmp-lz-p-network
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use virtual-network-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-network
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use vnics in compartment cmp-lz-p-network
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage private-ips in compartment cmp-lz-p-network
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use load-balancers in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use vnics in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read ons-topics in compartment cmp-lz-p-security
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use vaults in compartment cmp-lz-p-security
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage instance-images in compartment cmp-lz-p-security
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use vss-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-security
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to use bastion in compartment cmp-lz-p-security
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read logging-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-security
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage database-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage autonomous-database-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to manage data-safe-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read autonomous-database-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
allow group 'id_lz_common'/'grp-lz-p-proj1-admins' to read database-family in compartment cmp-lz-p-projects:cmp-lz-p-proj1
